author: jacopoc
msg: Upgraded Freemarker jar from 2.3.4 to 2.3.8 (downloaded from http://prdownloads.sourceforge.net/freemarker/freemarker-2.3.8.tar.gz).
According to the new conventions, I've also renamed the jar file including the version number and updated the LICENSE and NOTICE files.

author: gnodet
msg: SM-757: Pipeline throws NPE when configured in synchronous mode and an exchange in ERROR status is received

author: gnodet
msg: SM-764: Jsr181 does not respect the transaction semantic (sync + tx)

author: gnodet
msg: SM-763: XPathPredicate should not copy the in message before processing it.
The message should have been copied by the caller if needed.

author: gnodet
msg: Add copyright and ensure deployed endpoint inherits ones of the allowed classes
